All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEntityGUI
AddEntityGUI class provides a static method to display a modal form window for adding a new entity (Customer, Supplier, etc.) in the JavaFX application.
AddWindowController
Controller class for Add Entity form.
BulkController
Controller for the Product Bulk Upload form
Customer
Represents a customer entity in the database.
CustomerDAO
 
DashboardController
 
DashboardStats
Class for the dashboard statistics Contains the total number of sales and purchase orders and the total revenue
DeleteConfirmationDialog
DeleteConfirmationDialog class provides a method to display a confirmation dialog before deleting an item from the database and the table view.
EditObjectGUI
EditObjectGUI class provides a static method to display a modal form window for editing an existing entity (Customer, Supplier, etc.) in the JavaFX application.
EditWindowController
 
InventoryManager
 
LanguageOption
Represents a language option for the application.
LanguageSelectorHandler
LanguageSelectorHandler class provides methods to set up and handle language selection in a JavaFX application.
LanguageUtil
LanguageUtil class provides methods to manage localization settings in the application.
LoginController
 
LoginGUI
LoginGUI class is responsible for displaying the login window of the application.
MariaDbJpaConnection
Class for managing the EntityManager instances for MariaDB.
MassImportGUI
MassImportGUI class is responsible for displaying a modal window for mass importing products in the application.
OrderItemId
Composite primary key for PurchaseOrderItem
OrderStatus
OrderStatus enum represents the status of a sales order.
Product
Represents a product entity in the database.
ProductDAO
Data Access Object for Product
PurchaseOrder
Represents a purchase order in the database.
PurchaseOrderDAO
Data Access Object for PurchaseOrder
PurchaseOrderItem
Represents an item in a purchase order It has the following attributes: - purchaseOrder: the purchase order to which the item belongs - product: the product being ordered - quantity: the quantity of the product being ordered - unitPrice: the unit price of the product - sale: the sale percentage of the product
PurchaseOrderItemDAO
Data Access Object for PurchaseOrderItem
PurchaseService
 
SalesOrder
SalesOrder class represents a sales order in the database.
SalesOrderDAO
Data Access Object for SalesOrder
SalesOrderItem
Represents an item in a sales order It has the following attributes: - salesOrder: the sales order to which the item belongs - product: the product being ordered - quantity: the quantity of the product being ordered - unitPrice: the unit price of the product - sale: the sale percentage of the product
SalesOrderItemDAO
Data Access Object for SalesOrderItem
SalesPurchaseGUI
SalesPurchaseGUI class is responsible for displaying a modal window for creating sales or purchase orders in the application.
SalesService
 
SignupController
 
Stat
Class for the statistics Contains the name and value of a statistic Used in the statistics table in the GUI
StatsHandler
 
StockController
 
Supplier
Represents a supplier entity in the database.
SupplierDAO
 
TableInitializer
TableInitializer class provides methods to initialize columns for various tables in the JavaFX application.
TranslateUtil
 
User
User data
UserDAO
 
UserRole
UserRole enum represents the role of a user in the system.
ViewRefresher
